info.name: Chat With Your Documents Backend
info.summary: Python backend for Chat With Your Documents
info.description:
This is a Python backend for Chat With Your Documents. It exposes a REST API for the Nextcloud App to use. It is useful for people who want to index their documents and ask questions about them.
Refer to [How to install](https://github.com/nextcloud/schackles/blob/master/HOW_TO_INSTALL.md) to try it.
info.author: Anupam Kumar
